Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: r
Description: Start R or invoke an R tool using CMD

Arguments.Name: --encoding
Arguments.Description: Specify encoding to be used for stdin

Arguments.Name: --save
Arguments.Description: Save workspace at the end of the session

Arguments.Name: --no-save
Arguments.Description: Do not save workspace at the end of the session

Arguments.Name: --no-environ
Arguments.Description: Do not read the site and user environment files

Arguments.Name: --no-site-file
Arguments.Description: Do not read the site-wide Rprofile

Arguments.Name: --no-init-file
Arguments.Description: Do not read the user R profile

Arguments.Name: --restore
Arguments.Description: Do restore previously saved objects at startup

Arguments.Name: --no-restore-data
Arguments.Description: Do not restore previously saved objects

Arguments.Name: --no-restore-history
Arguments.Description: Do not restore the R history file

Arguments.Name: --no-readline
Arguments.Description: Do not use readline for command-line editing

Arguments.Name: --max-ppsize
Arguments.Description: Set max size of protect stack

Arguments.Name: --min-nsize
Arguments.Description: Set min number of fixed size obj's ('cons cells')

Arguments.Name: --min-vsize
Arguments.Description: Set vector heap minimum (in bytes or '4M' = 4 MegaB)

Arguments.Name: --no-echo
Arguments.Description: Make R run as quietly as possible

Arguments.Name: --args
Arguments.Description: Skip the rest of the command line

Arguments.Name: -e
Arguments.Description: Execute and R expression and exit

Arguments.Name: RHOME
Arguments.Description: Print path to R home directory and exit

Arguments.Name: COMPILE
Arguments.Description: Compile files for use with R (not available on Windows)

Arguments.Name: SHLIB
Arguments.Description: Compile the given source files and then link all specified object files

Arguments.Name: --preclean
Arguments.Description: Remove files created during a previous run

Arguments.Name: --dry-run
Arguments.Description: Dry run; shows commands that would be used

Arguments.Name: --preclean
Arguments.Description: Remove files created during a previous run

Arguments.Name: --library
Arguments.Description: Install packages to library tree LIB

Arguments.Name: --no-configure
Arguments.Description: Do not use the package's configure script

Arguments.Name: --no-docs
Arguments.Description: Do not install HTML, LaTeX or examples help

Arguments.Name: --example
Arguments.Description: Install R code for help examples

Arguments.Name: --fake
Arguments.Description: Do minimal install for testing purposes

Arguments.Name: --no-lock
Arguments.Description: Install on top of any existing installation without using a lock directory

Arguments.Name: --pkglock
Arguments.Description: Use a per-package lock directory (default for a single package)

Arguments.Name: --build
Arguments.Description: Build binaries of the installed package(s)

Arguments.Name: --no-R
Arguments.Description: Suppress installation of the package R code

Arguments.Name: --no-libs
Arguments.Description: Suppress installation of the package libs

Arguments.Name: --no-data
Arguments.Description: Suppress installation of the package data

Arguments.Name: --no-help
Arguments.Description: Suppress installation of the package help

Arguments.Name: --no-demo
Arguments.Description: Suppress installation of the package demo

Arguments.Name: --data-compress
Arguments.Description: Compression to be used for lazy-loading of data

Arguments.Name: --resave-data
Arguments.Description: Re-save data files as compactly as possible

Arguments.Name: --without-keep.source
Arguments.Description: Do not use 'keep.source' for R code

Arguments.Name: --staged-install
Arguments.Description: Install to a temporary directory and then move to the target directory (default)

Arguments.Name: --no-staged-install
Arguments.Description: Install directly to the target directory

Arguments.Name: --no-test-load
Arguments.Description: Skip test of loading installed package

Arguments.Name: --no-clean-on-error
Arguments.Description: Do not remove installed package on error

Arguments.Name: --merge-multiarch
Arguments.Description: Multi-arch by merging (from a single tarball only)

Arguments.Name: --use-vanilla
Arguments.Description: Do not read any Renviron or Rprofile files

Arguments.Name: --configure-args
Arguments.Description: Set arguments for the configure scripts

Arguments.Name: --configure-vars
Arguments.Description: Set variables for the configure scripts

Arguments.Name: --built-timestamp
Arguments.Description: Set timestamp for 'Built' entry in DESCRIPTION (Unix only)

Arguments.Name: --force-biarch
Arguments.Description: Attempt to build both architectures (Windows only)

Arguments.Name: --compile-both
Arguments.Description: Compile both architectures on 32-bit Windows (Windows only)

Arguments.Name: --library
Arguments.Description: The library tree to remove from

Arguments.Name: build
Arguments.Description: Build R packages from package sources

Arguments.Name: --no-manual
Arguments.Description: Do not build the PDF manual

Arguments.Name: --resave-data
Arguments.Description: Re-save data files as compactly as possible

Arguments.Name: --compact-vignettes
Arguments.Description: Try to compact PDF files under 'inst/doc'

Arguments.Name: --compression
Arguments.Description: Type of compression to be used on tarball

Arguments.Name: --log
Arguments.Description: Log to file 'pkg-00build.log' when processing the pkgdir with basename 'pkg'

Arguments.Name: check
Arguments.Description: Check R packages from package sources

Arguments.Name: --library
Arguments.Description: Library used for test installation of packages

Arguments.Name: --no-clean
Arguments.Description: Do not clean 'outdir' before using it

Arguments.Name: --no-codoc
Arguments.Description: Do not check for code/documentation mismatches

Arguments.Name: --no-examples
Arguments.Description: Do not run the examples in the Rd files

Arguments.Name: --no-tests
Arguments.Description: Do not run code in 'tests' subdirectory

Arguments.Name: --no-manual
Arguments.Description: Do not produce the PDF manual

Arguments.Name: --no-vignettes
Arguments.Description: Do not run R code in vignettes nor build outputs

Arguments.Name: --run-dontrun
Arguments.Description: Do run `dontrun{}` sections in the Rd files

Arguments.Name: --run-donttest
Arguments.Description: Do run `donttest{}` sections in the Rd files

Arguments.Name: --use-valgrind
Arguments.Description: Use `valgrind` when running examples, tests, vignettes

Arguments.Name: --install-args
Arguments.Description: Command-line args to be passed to INSTALL

Arguments.Name: --test-dir
Arguments.Description: Look in this subdirectory for test scripts

Arguments.Name: --no-stop-on-test-error
Arguments.Description: Do not stop running tests after first error

Arguments.Name: --check-subdirs
Arguments.Description: Run checks on the package subdirectories

Arguments.Name: --as-cran
Arguments.Description: Select customizations similar to those used by CRAN

Arguments.Name: --extra-arch
Arguments.Description: Do only runtime tests needed for an additional sub-architecture

Arguments.Name: --multiarch
Arguments.Description: Do runtime tests on all installed sub-archs

Arguments.Name: --no-multiarch
Arguments.Description: Do runtime tests only on the main sub-architecture

Arguments.Name: --force-multiarch
Arguments.Description: Run tests on all sub-archs even for packages with no compiled code

Arguments.Name: Rdconv
Arguments.Description: Convert R documentation to other formats

Arguments.Name: --RdMacros
Arguments.Description: Packages from which to get Rd macros

Arguments.Name: Rd2pdf
Arguments.Description: Generate PDF output from R documentation files

Arguments.Name: --no-clean
Arguments.Description: Do not remove created temporary files

Arguments.Name: --no-preview
Arguments.Description: Do not preview generated PDF file

Arguments.Name: --force
Arguments.Description: Overwrite output file if it exists

Arguments.Name: --title
Arguments.Description: Set the title of the document

Arguments.Name: --no-description
Arguments.Description: Do not typeset the description of a package

Arguments.Name: --RdMacros
Arguments.Description: Packages from which to get Rd macros

Arguments.Name: --RdMacros
Arguments.Description: Packages from which to get Rd macros

Arguments.Name: Stangle
Arguments.Description: A front-end for Stangle and other vignette engines

Arguments.Name: Sweave
Arguments.Description: A front-end for Sweave and other vignette engines

Arguments.Name: --clean
Arguments.Description: Remove some of the created files

Arguments.Name: Rdiff
Arguments.Description: Diff R output files, discarding the R startup message

Arguments.Name: config
Arguments.Description: Get the value of a basic R configure variable

Arguments.Name: --cppflags
Arguments.Description: Print pre-processor flags required to compile a C/C++ file as part of a front-end using R as a library

Arguments.Name: --ldflags
Arguments.Description: Print linker flags needed for linking a front-end against the R library

Arguments.Name: --all
Arguments.Description: Print names and values of all variables

Arguments.Name: javareconf
Arguments.Description: Detect current Java setup and update the corresponding configuration in R

Arguments.Name: -n
Arguments.Description: Perform Java detection, but don't touch any configuration files

Arguments.Name: e
Arguments.Description: Same as -n but exports all detected variables and runs '<prog>'

Arguments.Name: rtags
Arguments.Description: Tag C, R, and Rd files under a directory

Arguments.Name: --append
Arguments.Description: Append to output file (overwrites by default)

Arguments.Name: --verbose
Arguments.Description: Echo the name of files processed
